title: Multiple window support
description: The ability to open multiple MacWhisper windows at the same time side by side.

title: iOS and iPadOS app
description: A simple first version of MacWhisper for your mobile devices

title: Translate during Batch transcription
description: Right now you can only translate files manually in the regular transcription mode. In batch mode it could be an option to automatically translate a file before it is saved and then save the translated and regular version automatically.

title: Add an option to show a preflight screen before starting a transcription
description: This would let you (optionally) adjust the settings that will be used for a transcription before you start.

title: Adjust timecodes
description: Improved support for different or custom timecodes
